revised_title: A Comprehensive Study of Birds and their Classification
tldr: This article provides a detailed study of birds, their anatomy, behavior, and classification. It covers the history of birds, their external and internal parts, their age, and observable properties. The author also discusses various bird species, their habitats, and their breeding patterns. The article is divided into three books, focusing on different aspects of birds, including land-fowl, water-fowl, and their classification.
